top.title: Alleged Bondi gunman charged with 15 counts of murder
top.summary: Naveed Akram, 24, faces 59 charges in total following the attack at Sydney's Bondi Beach on Sunday.

top.title: 'An unspeakable loss': Funeral takes place for rabbi killed in Bondi shooting
top.summary: UK-born Rabbi Schlanger mourned as someone beloved by his community and who spread "love and joy".

top.title: Venezuela denounces Trump's order for ship blockade as 'warmongering threats'
top.summary: It comes a week after the US seized an oil tanker off the country's coast, intensifying pressure on Nicolás Maduro.

top.title: Downing Street insists negotiations over US-UK tech deal still live
top.summary: When the partnership was unveiled in September the UK government said it would "shape the futures of millions of people".

top.title: Former chancellor George Osborne joins OpenAI
top.summary: Osborne said it was a privilege to become managing director of OpenAI for Countries based in London.

top.title: UK launches taskforce to 'break down barriers' for women in technology
top.summary: It comes after the government was urged to help close the UK tech sector's gender gap in order to meet its ambitious AI goals.

Tesla misled customers about self-driving features, judge rules
Even Trump’s chief of staff was ‘aghast’ at Elon Musk’s deadly USAID cuts
